newsitem.title: UK: Tambang Timah at $13.95 in London.
newsitem.headline: Tambang Timah at $13.95 in London.

text.p: PT Tambang Timah closed at $13.95 per GDR in London on Wednesday. It recorded the day's low of $13.675 and the day's high of $14.325.
One Global Depository Receipt represents 10 common shares. -- Jakarta newsroom +6221 384-6364
